title: Мой ангел
overview: Arkady is about thirty, and he himself knows that he is a weakling. He was kicked out of work, he lost his home and his beloved girlfriend... It was at this moment that Angela appeared in his life. She seems so carefree, so reckless. Next to her, Arkady can somehow handle everything. There is more between them than falling in love. In a matter of days they become true friends. But it soon becomes clear that angels are not such easy creatures, and their lives can be very difficult...
